!Witch Athrea: Oh No! You didn't find any single one of the 4 Boxes! You failed! A complete failure! Well, well, well. I can just coldly kick you guys out of here. But I'm too soft-hearted to do so. So, I am going to give you another chance to go take the test. However... it's going to cost some money to make the boxes again, understand? If you pay 10,000 adena, I will make the boxes again, so that you can re-take the test. What do you say? [Quest _501_ProofOfClanAlliance 30758-07.htm|Tell her that you will pay her 10,000 adena.]
